climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Formulated without alcohol*, parabens or phthalates (*does not contain ethanol, isopropanol or rubbing alcohol)
Made with plant based FSC Certified fiber wipes
Gentle wipes for newborns and up
Safe for cleaning all around baby including bottom, hands, and face
DO NOT FLUSH. Dispose of used wipes in trash receptacle. Store at room temperature. Close lid tightly to retain moisture.
Packaging made with at least 25% Post Consumer Recycled Material
body.description: Made with 99% purified water and a touch of cotton for softness, Mama Bear Water Wipes are the gentle way to clean newborns and up, from head to toe. Free from alcohol*, parabens or phthalates, our water wipes are safe to use all around babies, including bottom, hands and face. Resealable packs and multipacks make cleaning your cub easy and convenient, whether around the house or on the go. *Does not contain ethanol, isopropanol or rubbing alcohol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Brand - Mama Bear 99% Water Baby Wipes: A Gentle Touch for Little Ones
reviews.reviewText: As a parent navigating the world of baby wipes, I recently had the pleasure of trying the Amazon Brand - Mama Bear 99% Water Baby Wipes, and it's safe to say they have become a staple in my parenting arsenal. Here's a comprehensive look at what makes these wipes a standout choice:1. **Gentle Composition:** The "99% Water" claim is not just a number—it's a commitment to gentle care. These wipes are incredibly soft and gentle on my baby's delicate skin, providing a comforting touch during diaper changes and everyday cleanups.2. **Hypoallergenic Assurance:** For parents like me, who are mindful of potential allergies and sensitivities, the hypoallergenic feature of these wipes is a game-changer. They have caused no adverse reactions on my baby's skin, offering peace of mind with every use.3. **Fragrance-Free Delight:** The absence of artificial fragrances is a noteworthy feature. These wipes have a clean and neutral scent, perfect for those who prefer to keep scents to a minimum, ensuring a fresh and natural feel during use.4. **Bulk Packaging Convenience:** The 432-count packaging (6 Packs of 72) is a blessing for busy parents. With wipes strategically distributed across multiple packs, I can keep them handy in various locations—diaper bag, changing station, and even in the car—ensuring I'm always prepared for unexpected messes.5. **Thick and Durable:** These wipes boast a robust thickness that adds to their durability. I've experienced no issues with tearing or stretching, making each wipe reliably effective in handling messes, big or small.6. **Multi-Purpose Functionality:** Beyond diaper changes, these wipes have proven to be versatile. From wiping sticky hands and faces to cleaning surfaces, they serve as an all-in-one solution for various parenting needs.7. **Resealable Packaging:** The resealable design of each pack ensures the wipes stay moist and fresh. It's a thoughtful touch that prevents unnecessary drying out, especially for parents who don't go through wipes as quickly.8. **Value for Money:** Considering the quantity in each package, the Mama Bear 99% Water Baby Wipes offer excellent value for money. The combination of quality, quantity, and affordability makes them a practical choice for budget-conscious parents.In conclusion, the Amazon Brand - Mama Bear 99% Water Baby Wipes have earned their spot as a trusted companion in my parenting journey. Their commitment to gentle care, hypoallergenic nature, and practical packaging make them a top choice for parents seeking a reliable and affordable baby wipe option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to waterwipes
reviews.reviewText: Same results as water wipes, good for sensitive skin and causes no rash on use. A very good affordable alternate to water wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water wipes!
reviews.reviewText: I am disabled and have tried a lot of different water based wipes. These are by far the best! The moisture is exactly right. They are thin but durable. Every time I try a different brand I regret it! I really hope they never stop selling these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fragrance free wipes
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using these for over a year for the whole family. They make diaper changes a breeze and soothe sore bums. They are nice to wipe sticky hands, too! They are flexible, soft, AND durable. We get an order every six weeks with no end in sight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy and all-purpose wipes - use them all day long
reviews.reviewText: We are now on our 3rd order of Mama Bear wipes! Four reasons:--they are strong, won't tear--gentle for private areas and perfect for cleaning messy spills--no annoying scent--the price is right! Less $ than traditional baby wipes we used to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great! I love them! I like how big and soft they are! Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used to use “Water Wipes then saw these & decided to give them a try as the price point is so much better. These wipes are just as good & I had no irritation as I have very sensitive skin. These are wonderful for every member of the family as they are fragrance free & 99% WATER! Great for hot summer days or anytime. Great for wiping kids’ faces and dirty hands! I use them all the time & keep a pack in my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are our favorite wipes for our little one. They work well, baby hasn't had any issues with them, they're cheap, the package is nice, and the next wipe follows because they're folded together.I prefer these over the Water Wipes and the water wipes are much more expensive.
